review.title: Way Overpriced for the quality
review.reviewText:
The room was outdated with banged up furniture and holes in the walls where
Things used to hang. Smelled stale and strange odor in the room. You cannot control the air from the room, apparently it's all central air and all you can do is turn on the fan. If you like to leave a bathroom light on for night trips to the bathroom, forget it...all the lights are on timers that auto turn off except the two next to the bed. The bed was comfortable. The night staff was very friendly, Day staff not so much. The rooms are outside entrance. The hotel has three Stories and no elevator, so you have to lug your luggage up and down outdoor stairs if you're  on upper floors. Parking is limited, if the hotel is full you may not find a place to park in their parking lot. I overheard people complaining about that when I was searching for ice. Thin walls, noisy, woke up early to the intense smell of bacon, which I guess would be okay if I wasn't a vegatarian. I will not stay here again. It's a overpriced no frills outdated hotel that charges you for the proximity to the airport. If I hadn't been exhausted from my flight I wouldn't have stayed there.
review.positiveRemarks: Bed was acceptable. Proximity to airport. Night staff was very friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: Lower price. Update rooms. Fix holes in walls and clean vents in ceilings. Paint over ceiling tile stains or replace them.

review.title: couldn't call into the hotel; no phone service
review.reviewText: No rooms were ready when we arrived from the airport at 1p. Neither I, nor Expedia, could contact the hotel prior to arrival as the phones were not working. No air conditioning, low end hotel.  Would not stay there again.
review.locationRemarks: N/A as I was in San Francisco for business.

review.title: Location was Great, but....
review.reviewText:
Negatives:  the first night while I was sleeping the heater kicked on, I can't sleep well in the heat and even though I managed to get it turned off  there was no air-conditioning to counter it's effects.  My ground floor room offered little privacy unless my blackout shades were drawn.  It was often noisy and I didn't feel safe leaving my window open while I slept.

Positives:  The location is awesome!  A beautiful paved bayside trail is steps away - great for walks and plane watching.  Two great restaurants are right next door - Elephant Bar and El Torito.  The hot breakfast served each morning was nice.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review on your recent trip. We appreciate all your feedback. We are glad you were satisfied with your stay. We hope to see you on your next visit to the area.

review.title: Great airport location
review.reviewText: Easy quick check in slightly early which was great after 30 hours travel. Room was clean and spacious for the price, couldn't fault it.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all your feedback. We apologize our furniture was not up to par.

review.reviewText: very cheap room furnishings as well as maintenance .

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all your feedback. We are glad you were satisfied with your short stay with us. We do apologize for our bathroom vents.

review.title: Decent place to put your feet up
review.reviewText:
Very standard hotel with all the minimal amenities provided. Don't expect to be wow. This is a place to go to for a clean room for a night or two near SFO airport. The free breakfast is a huge plus for those that don't want to hassle with looking for food if they have an early morning flight.

The room had clean sheets, floors and bathroom. My biggest complaint was the noisy overhead vent in the bathroom that you CAN NOT turn off. I also had to pull the plug from the in-room refrigerator as it was nearing it's end of life and was making very loud sounds each time the condenser turned on. It was absolutely impossible to sleep with the refrigerator on. The vent was manageable with the bathroom door closed. Lastly, you can hear the planes taking off and landing as the hotel is directly across the lake from SFO air strips. Have caution if you are a light sleeper.
review.negativeRemarks: Give us a way to turn off the bathroom vents...
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient if you are just spending the night and have an early morning flight or if you just like planes in general.

review.title: Very close to SFO and good price on Expedia.
review.reviewText: Easy check in and friendly staff, good coffee in the morning.
review.positiveRemarks: The shuttle service was very helpful for an early departure.

review.title: Dirty rooms-even if you pay for upgraded
review.reviewText: We arrived at the hotel late in the evening.  The staff was very friendly.  First thing I see when I open the door is the furry mold growing on the ceiling tile by the entrance. (Pictures)  Then I walk in the bathroom and there is used tissue laying on the back of the toilet on top of the new roll of toilet paper and the towel is quite dirty.

review.title: Nice, clean and comfortable.
review.reviewText: I'm very satisfied with everything. Highly recommended.

review.title: Cutbacks have ruined it
review.reviewText: No conditoining. miserable would never stay there again

review.title: Air conditioning was not controllable, stuffy
review.reviewText: For San Francisco and the price, it'll do.  Do not come with expectations of grandeur or ability to control the climate in your room.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: Close to the SFC great location, next to the bay great for a short walk. The room is clean , environmental  friendly shampoo and soap packaging, the AC wasn't on thus I need to open the window to let the cool air in which is also not safe in my opinion. Breakfast is good, hot items, pastries and fruits.

review.title: Noisy.  Scary
review.reviewText: Noisy.  People walking around and talking late at night.  Car alarms woke me up.  And the clientel included a drunk man who met me at the elevators and wanted to ride with me and talk with me.  No thank you.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and for being our guest. We are happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you on your next stay! Please do tell your family and friends about your experience with us. Word of mouth is one of our best friends.

review.title: Nice hotel with nice views
review.reviewText: We like staying here because of the view of the airport and the bay. Calming even with the sounds of airplanes. Breakfast was better than most inns I've been in. The only thing I would have to say is the prices should be lower.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all your feedback. We hope to see you again if you are in the SFO area.

review.title: A value moderate price hotel
review.reviewText: Location and service good for it's value when the price is low.
review.positiveRemarks: Location and service including full 4 cup coffee maker and computer with printer available to use. Also free internet.
review.negativeRemarks: They need to upgrade their heating/ac system so that each room has a way to control it's comfort. The central system they have sucks!!
review.locationRemarks: A couple of good places to eat and hotel shuttle to airport to access BART into San Francisco.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review on your recent trip. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Hope to see you on your next visit.

review.reviewText: Great place, very clean, and complementary breakfast...

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review on your recent trip. We apologize you were not satisfied with your stay with us.

review.title: Would not recommend
review.reviewText: Room had musty odor, holes all in walls, mattresses were totally uncomfortable, no air conditioner... just heat available in the rooms due to centralized air/heat system. Overall room appearance was terrible and dirty.
review.negativeRemarks: Everything as far as the room is concerned.
review.locationRemarks: Near by airport and auto repair shop.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. We strive not only to meet, but to exceed our guest expectations and I apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us. I do hope you would give us another chance and consider staying with us again in the future.

review.title: Not good at all
review.reviewText:
The room #208 was doused in some horrible smelling (like a nauseating cheap perfume) scent! There were no alternative rooms available we were told, so open the doors and window (which was already fully open so somebody knew something was wrong!). There was no fan working in the bathroom, so that didn't help. On top of that the place was generally old and grubby.
In the breakfast bar there were only 2 - 20" tables! That's for approx. 200 guests! I know SF is expensive, but this room with taxes cost almost $200 and was truly almost the worst place we've ever stayed. The only place worse was 25 years ago costing $17 and was our only option to sleeping in our car!
review.positiveRemarks: It was close to the airport and included a shuttle.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. We strive not only to meet, but to exceed our guest expectations and I apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us. I do hope you would give us another chance and consider staying with us again in the future.

review.title: Loud as hell.
review.reviewText: The overall hotel seems pretty rundown and does not really look like the photos at all.  The breakfast was better than we expected though.  It is LOUD.  It is close to the airport and you hear every plane like it is taking off in your room.  The room was clean though.  Overall?  Very expensive for a loud and shabby hotel.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. We strive not only to meet, but to exceed our guest expectations and I apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us. I do hope you would give us another chance and consider staying with us again in the future.

review.title: Better hotels  available for the same price range
review.reviewText: Old tired Hotel, straight  out  of the 1970's. Good location relative  to  SFO. Otherwise, avoid  it.
